title: Studio with Office/Bonus Room! Blocks from Uptown, near Lake Merritt
posting_body: ['261 Fairmount Avenue Oakland, CA 94611', 'Offered by Bay Apartment Advisors', 'Please TEXT Tanya', 'show contact info', 'to schedule a showing', "This studio/junior one-bedroom unit is situated close to several of Oakland's best neighborhoods, and has NEW hardwood floors.", 'This is a COZY apt.please watch the video walkthrough to make sure this space would work for you!', 'Great storage, large kitchen.', 'ELECTRICITY IS INCLUDED in the rent.', 'Located just a couple blocks from Uptown, and with Walk Score of 87, you are just a short trip away from Target, Whole Foods, Sprouts, CVS, Piedmont Ave, Broadway.', 'With a pedestrian walkway that leads to Broadway Ave and convenient access to several of the East Bay’s major freeways, this apartment also makes a great home for commuters and walkers alike.', 'Check out the photos!', '**Please read entire ad before emailing questions.', '**', 'KEY FEATURES', '• Bedrooms: 0 Bed (extra room that can be used as an office)', '• Bathrooms: 1 Bath', '• Sq.', 'Footage: 350 +/-', '• Floor: 1st', '• Parking:', 'Available for $100.00 per month.', '•', 'Laundry:', 'On-site', 'PROPERTY HIGHLIGHTS', '- Walking distance to Target, CVS, Sprout’s Market, Chipotle, and Whole Foods.', '- Quiet complex.', '- Quick access to 580, 80, 880, 24, and 13 Freeways.', '- Highly desirable location, close to 19th Street BART, Downtown Oakland, Adam’s Point, and Lake Merritt.', 'LEASE TERMS', '• Rent: $1,495.00', '• Deposit: $1,495.00', '• Lease Duration: 1 Year', '• Pets – (Cat with an additional deposit)', '• Utilities Water, Sewer, Garbage, ELECTRICITY IS INCLUDED.', '• Available: NOW', 'Rental listings subject to change at any time.', '(Broker) believes all information contained herein to be correct but assumes no legal responsibility for the accuracy, any errors, or any omissions in this ad or any syndicated ads on third party websites.', 'Square footage is an estimate only, not an exact measurement.', 'Check our website for other listings: <URL>']
